name: His-Tag Protein Purification
description: Purification of His-tagged proteins using Ni-NTA affinity chromatography

steps.notes: Keep on ice, pulse 5 sec on/10 sec off

steps.action: Equilibrate Ni-NTA column with binding buffer
Dialyze or buffer exchange if needed

materials: Lysis buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.5, 300 mM NaCl, 10 mM imidazole)
Binding buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.5, 300 mM NaCl, 20 mM imidazole)
Wash buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.5, 300 mM NaCl, 50 mM imidazole)
Elution buffer (50 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.5, 300 mM NaCl, 250 mM imidazole)
notes: Keep all buffers and samples cold throughout purification. Store purified protein with 10% glycerol for long-term stability.
